backend/main.mo: Defines the gym management backend actor with access control, storage mixins, and comprehensive types for users, members, plans, payments, bookings, workouts, diet plans, and reports.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two UI simulation/disclaimer features to their related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing each major frontend file’s responsibilities in authentication, dashboards, member tools, admin tools, and shared UI components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH color variables, theme layers, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the Prime Fit Gym frontend and mounts the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication for admins and members, initializing the II actor, and routing to login or role-specific dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/Communicat: Alert component explaining that displayed communication logs are simulated and not actually delivered.
Displays simulated email/SMS/WhatsApp logs and member credentials after manual member creation.
frontend/src/components/admin/FinancialM: Admin UI for viewing payments and expenses and adding new financial records with dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/MemberMana: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, deleting members, managing plans, and generating QR codes.
frontend/src/components/admin/Reports.ts: Displays gym reports including revenue, expenses, membership stats, charts, and sorted member status data.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffManag: Placeholder card for upcoming staff management features like trainer profiles and scheduling.
Shared layout component for admin and member dashboards with theming, user menu, profile picture handling, and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/member/Attendanc: Shows a member's attendance records in a sortable table with dates, check-in/out times, and durations.
frontend/src/components/member/ClassBook: Allows members to view, book, and cancel class bookings with a dialog form and status badges.
frontend/src/components/member/MemberOve: Provides an overview of member profile details, attendance stats, status, and profile picture handling.
frontend/src/components/member/MemberPor: Aggregates member profile, attendance, bookings, payments, and notifications into a unified dashboard.
frontend/src/components/member/MyDiet.ts: Displays the member’s assigned diet plan with macros and meal details, or shows a placeholder if none exists.
frontend/src/components/member/MyWorkout: Displays the member's workout plan with exercises or shows a loading or empty state.
frontend/src/components/member/Notificat: Renders and prioritizes notification alerts with dismiss and optional action buttons.
frontend/src/components/member/PaymentWa: Shows member payment totals and a history table or a no-records message.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePictureMo: Modal dialog for displaying full-size profile pictures with a closable overlay and zoom animation.
User profile settings UI enabling editing of name, email, profile picture, and admin role assignment.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component content.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeDialog.tsx: Dialog that generates and displays a QR code for a member and allows copying the encoded data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, persistence, and context for authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend operations like profiles, roles, payments, and member data.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tab-based navigation for managing members, finances, staff, and reports.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements member login and Internet Identity login with form validation, error handling, and navigation after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MemberDashboard.tsx: Wraps the member portal inside a member-specific dashboard layout.
frontend/src/pages/TrainerDashboard.tsx: Empty page placeholder for the trainer dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, issues, and pending requests for the Prime Fit Gym management system.
